      • wipeLoaded

        private void wipeLoaded()
        Wipes all loaded images and PxAttrs, closes open tabs, clears the map list, and disables menu items that only function on loaded mods. In other words, erases all stored and open remnants of the current mod.

      • loadMod

        private void loadMod(java.nio.file.Path executable)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a mod, checking if it is valid. Also creates its assist folder
        Parameters:
        executable - A File that references the executable for a mod
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the mod could not be initialized or was invalid in some way

      • createAssistFolder

      • createZoomSubmenu

        private javafx.scene.control.RadioMenuItem[] createZoomSubmenu(int defaultZoom)
        Used for creating the Map and Tileset zoom submenus
        Parameters:
        defaultZoom - The current/default zoom level, the RadioMenuItem for which will be selected.
        Returns:
        An array of RadioMenuItems in a ToggleGroup that can be used to set a zoom level. None of them are bound to an EventHandler <ActionEvent>, so that must be done after they are created

      • showLicense

        private void showLicense()
        Prompts the user, asking them if they agree to the license terms (Apache 2.0). Also sets Config.licenseRead.
